Once Enchanted, you are apart of the Coven team and are no longer apart of your original team.
GlowInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
During lights out, you and players nearby you will receive a vision boost.
RadarInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As Radar, you have arrows pointing towards the closest person at all times.
DiseasedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When someone tries to use the Kill button on you, their Cooldown will be increased by a configurable amount of time.
AntidoteInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When someone tries to use the Kill button on you, their Cooldown will be decreased by a configurable amount of time.
StubbornInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
With the Stubborn Add-on, Eraser can't erase your role, Cleanser can't cleanse you, Bandit can't steal from you, and Monarch can't knight you.
Additionally, you can't gain any new Add-ons from the Merchant.
SwiftInfoLong:
(Complementos): 
El Raudo no se abalanzará sobre sus víctimas al asesinar
UnluckyInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As Unlucky, when you Complete Tasks, Kill, Venting, or open a Door, you have a chance to die.
SpurtInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When you start walking, you gain an enormous speed boost, which swiftly deteriorates, until you have to rest still for a while to rejuvenate your speed.
VoidBallotInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
Holder of this Add-on will have 0 vote count.
AwareInfoLong:
(Complementos): 
El Precavido será notificado durante la próxima reunión si un rol que revela haya interactuado contigo.
FragileInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As Fragile, you will instantly die if someone tries to use the Kill button on you (even if the role cannot directly kill).
GhoulInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Ghoul, one of two outcomes can occur on task completion.

If alive: Suicide
If dead: You kill your killer if they're alive.

This is only assigned to Crewmates, and not Crewmates with no tasks or are task-based.
BloodthirstInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Bloodthirst, doing tasks allows you to become bloodthirsty and kill players.
When you finish a task, the next player you come in contact with dies.

Your Bloodthirst remains after a meeting.
Upon making a kill, your Bloodthirst clears till the next task you complete.
Bloodthirsts do not stack.

Only assigned to Crewmates with tasks.
MareInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Mare, you have a low Kill Cooldown and have higher speed but can only kill during lights.

Additionally, your name will appear in red during lights.

Only assigned to Impostors and cannot be guessed.
BurstInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Burst, your killer explodes if they aren't inside a Vent after a set amount of time.
SleuthInfoLong:
(Complementos): 
El Sabueso puede obtener información sobre los cadáveres.

Opcionalmente, puedes recibir información sobre el asesino.

El Detective o Director de Funeraria no recibirá este Complemento.
ClumsyInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Clumsy, you have a chance to miss your kill.

When you miss, your Cooldown is reset, and the target remains untouched.

Only assigned to killers.
CircumventInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Circumvent, you can't Vent.

Only assigned to Impostors.
NimbleInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Nimble, you gain access to the Vent button.

Only assigned to certain Crewmates.
InfluencedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Influenced, your vote will be forced to the player with the most votes.
Influenced vote won't be counted while choosing the exiled player'
Note that your vote skill still functions on the player you voted first
If all the alive players are Influenced, then the vote result won't shift
Collector cannot become Influenced.
SilentInfoLong:
(Complementos):
Como el Silencioso, no muestra a quién has votado.
SusceptibleInfoLong:
(Complementos):
El Susceptible tendrá una causa de muerte totalmente aleatoria.
TrickyInfoLong:
(Complementos):
Como el Engañoso, tus asesinatos tendrán una razón de muerte aleatoria.
TiredInfoLong:
(Complemento):
Cuando el Cansado mata, usa una habilidad para matar o completa una tarea, recibirán una bajada de visión y de velocidad temporal.
StatueInfoLong:
(Complementos):
Siempre que haya muchas personas cerca de la Estatua, esta se congela por completo o se ralentiza dependiendo de la configuración.
EvaderInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
When the Evader gets voted out, there is a chance they will not get ejected. (Chance set by the Host.)
CyberInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Cyber, you cannot die while in a group.
Depending on the settings, Impostors, Neutrals, and or Crewmates will know if you die.
HurriedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the hurried, you must finish all your tasks to win with your team! If you fail with your tasks, you lose.
Hurried hurries to his goal, so it won't get Madmate, Charmed or so.
OiiaiInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the OIIAI, when you die, you will make your killer forget their role.
Additionally, you may pass OIIAI on to the killer, depending on settings.
RainbowInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Rainbow, you change your colors like crazy.
GMInfoLong:
(Ninguno)
El Administrador es un espectador.
Su presencia no tiene ningún efecto en el juego, y todos los jugadores sabrán quién es el Administrador.
El rol de Administrador se le asignará al Anfitrión, quien automáticamente se convertirá en un fantasma al comienzo del juego.
SunnyboyInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Sunnyboy, you win if you are dead by the end of the game. The game will not end when you are alive due to killers gaining the majority.
Additionally, you have access to portable Vitals.
BardInfoLong:
(Impostors):
When a Bard is alive, the exile confirmation will display a sentence composed by the Bard. Whenever the Bard completes a creation, the Bard's Kill Cooldown will be permanently halved.
WardenInfoLong:
(Tripulantes [Fantasma]): 
Como el Alcaide, alerta a alguien de un peligro cercano, otorgándole además un aumento temporal de velocidad.
GhastlyInfoLong:
(Crewmates [Ghost]):
As the Ghastly, possess an unsuspecting person, after that choose a target for them, now they'll only be able to use their kill (or kill ability) on target until you possess someone else or possess time runs out.
MinionInfoLong:
(Impostor [Ghost]):
As the Minion, you can temporarily blind non-Impostors.
DollMasterInfoLong:
(Impostor):
As the Dollmaster, you can temporarily take control of any player by using the <color=#ff0000>Shapeshift</color> button and to make them do your deeds!
DoubleAgentInfoLong:
(Impostor):
As the Double Agent, you cannot access the Kill button. However, you can vote for someone in a meeting to pass a bomb onto them, which can only be done one player at a time. Once the meeting has finished, the bomb will activate and explode in a set amount of time.
Note: when you pass the bomb onto someone in a meeting, you can vote afterward.

Additionally depending on settings the Double Agent can diffuse <color=#696969>Bastion</color> and <color=#F4A460>Agitator</color> bombs when Venting.

The Double Agent can change roles when they are the <color=#ff1919>Last Impostor</color>, depending on the settings the role can be a <color=#ee43c3>Admired Impostor</color>, <color=#ff1919>Trickster</color>, <color=#BA2E05>Traitor</color>, or stay as the Double Agent.
SlothInfoLong:
(Complementos):
La velocidad de movimiento del Caminante es más baja que la del resto.
(La velocidad depende de las opciones del anfitrión)
ProhibitedInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Prohibited, you have specific Vents that you can't use.
How many Vents are disabled depends on the Host's settings.
EavesdropperInfoLong:
(Add-ons):
As the Eavesdropper, you have a chance to read other Role/Add-on information-based messages like Mortician or Sleuth.
ApocalypseInfoLong:
(Apocalypse):
Apocalypse members are on a separate team that works together and wins together. If there are multiple Apocalypse roles in the game, they can see each other's roles.
Depending on the Host's settings, Apocalypse roles can guess or be guessed.
RevenantInfoLong:
(Neutral):
As the Revenant, your goal is to be killed. If you are killed, you will take your killer's role and kill your killer instead. You cannot win before being killed.
Note that Revenant only works when being directly killed.

¿Te crees muy listo? Mirad a este gilipollas intentando usar el chat de lava, qué novatoooooooo

QuitTimesTillTempBan: La frecuencia de desconexiones para un baneo temporal
KickOtherPlatformPlayer: Expulsar jugadores que no jueguen en PC
ShareLobby: Allow TOHE-Chan Shares Lobby Code to Discord

WhenNonVote: Si el jugador no ha votado

DisableAirshipRecordsAdmin: Desactivar Mesa de Administración del Archivo (Airship)

DisableAirshipGapRoomLightsPanel: Desactivar Panel de la Sala del Foso (<color=#ed0007>Airship</color>)
DisableAirshipCargoLightsPanel: Desactivar Panel de la Bodega de Carga (<color=#ed0007>Airship</color>)
DisableOnSomeMaps: Disable Comms Camouflage on some maps
DisableReportWhenCC: Desactivar informe de cadáveres mientras que todos esten camuflados
ChangeNameToRoleInfo: Mostrar información de roles a gente sin el mod en la 1ra ronda
SendRoleDescriptionFirstMeeting: Mostrar descripción de roles a gente sin el mod en la 1ra reunión
RandomBirthdayAndHalloweenDecorationSkel: Set Random Decoration When Birthday And Halloween Is Active On <color=#66a186>The Skeld</color>
KickPlayerFriendCodeInvalid: Kick players with an invalid Friend Code
TempBanPlayerFriendCodeInvalid: Temp Ban players with an invalid Friend Code
ShowImpRemainOnEject: Mostrar <color=#ff1919>Impostores</color> restantes después de un exilio
ShowNKRemainOnEject: Mostrar <color=#7f8c8d>Asesinos Neutros</color> restantes después de un exilio
HideBittenRolesOnEject: Esconder roles de jugadores <color=#7b8968>mordidos<color> después de un exilio
ShowTeamNextToRoleNameOnEject: Mostrar el equipo del jugador exiliado
ShieldPersonDiedFirst: Escudo de pena para primer muerto de la partida anterior
ShieldedCanUseKillButton: Shielded player can use ability/Kill button
PlayerIsShieldedByGame: Player is protected by the game!
ArsonistKeepsGameGoing: El <color=#ff6633>Incendiario</color> hace que la partida continue
ArsonistCanIgniteAnytime: Puede prender fuego en cualquier momento
ArsonistMinPlayersToIgnite: Mínimo de jugadores a empapar para prender fuego
ArsonistMaxPlayersToIgnite: Máximo de jugadores a empapar para prender fuego
PuppeteerDoubleKills: La marioneta muere junto con la víctima
DollMasterCanKillAsMainBody: Can kill as the main body
DoubleAgentCanDiffuseBombs: Double Agent can diffuse bombs from other roles
DoubleAgentClearBombOnMeetingCall: Diffuse active bomb on meeting call
DoubleAgentCanUseAbilityInCalledMeeting: If diffused can use ability in called meeting
MastermindTimeLimit: Límite de tiempo para matar a alguien
MastermindDelay: Retraso de la notificación de manipulación
ManipulateNotify: Mata a alguien en {0}s o morirás
SurvivedManipulation: Has sobrevivido a la manipulación del <color=#ff1919>Genio</color>
HackedByGlitch: <color=#39FF14>Fuiste Hackeado por el Glitch, no puedes {0}.</color>
CrewpostorLungeKill: El TripuLostor se abalanza al matar
CrewpostorKillAfterTask: Number of tasks completed to make one kill
ImpsCanSeeEachOthersAddOns: <color=#ff1919>Impostores</color> pueden ver los Complementos de los demás
EGCanGuessTaskDoneSnitch: Puede adivinar al <color=#b8fb4f>Chivato</color> con sus tareas completadas
GuesserTryHideMsg: Try to hide the Guesser's command
GCanGuessImp: Un <color=#ff1919>Impostor</color> pueden adivinar a su equipo
GCanGuessCrew: Un <color=#8cffff>Tripulante</color> puede adivinar a su equipo
GCanGuessTaskDoneSnitch: Puede adivinar al <color=#b8fb4f>Chivato</color> con sus tareas completadas
BountySuccessKillCooldown: Tiempo de espera para matar después de matar al blanco
BountyFailureKillCooldown: Tiempo de espera después de matar a otra persona
BountyShowTargetArrow: Show arrow pointing towards the target
DefaultShapeshiftCooldown: Tiempo de espera para cambiar de forma por defecto
CantMoveOnVents: Can't Move on Vents (Unstable in <color=#66a186>Dleks</color> map)
ModeSwitchAction: Cambio de modo a través de
ShowShapeshiftAnimations: Mostrar siempre las animaciones de <color=#ff1919>Cambio de Forma</color>
ShapeshifterBase_ShapeshiftCooldown: Tiempo de espera para <color=#ff1919>cambiar de forma</color>
ScientistBase_BatteryCooldown: Tiempo de Espera para ver constantes
EngineerBase_VentCooldown: Tiempo de espera para usar conductos
MareKillCooldownInLightsOut: Tiempo de espera para matar en la oscuridad
MechanicFixesDoors: Puede abrir todas las puertas en una misma area
MechanicFixesReactors: Puede reparar el reactor por su cuenta
MechanicFixesOxygens: Puede reparar o2 por su cuenta
MechanicFixesCommunications: Puede reparar comms por su cuenta (Mira HQ)
MechanicFixesElectrical: Puede arreglar las luces con un solo interruptor

SheriffMisfireKillsTarget: Un disparo erróneo mata a la víctima

BlackHoleMovesTowardsNearestPlayer: Black Hole Moves Towards Nearest Player
SheriffCanKillAllAlive: Puede asesinar cuando todo el mundo está vivo
RebirthCountVotes: Solo renacer jugadores que hayan votado por él
RebirthFailed: Desgraciadamente, no encontraste ningún alma con la que puedas intercambiarte
ReverieMisfireSuicide: Misfire on reaching maximum Kill Cooldown
ConvertedReverieKillAll: El Ensimismado puede matar como le dé la gana si es convertido
VigilanteNotify: Te convertiste en aquello que juraste destruir
DictatorChangeCommandToExpel: <color=#df9b00>Dictator</color> use Command to expell instad of vote
DictatorExpelSelf: WAIT WAIT WAIT WAT THE HELLLLLL Bro really just want to expel himself
SnitchCanGetArrowColor: Ve flechas de colores con colores del equipo
MayorHasPortableButton: El <color=#204d42>Alcalde</color> tiene botón de emergencia portable
MayorNumOfUseButton: Maximum Number of Mobile Emergency Buttons
CannotVoteWhenDead: Cannot cast a vote while dead
VoteDisabled: /vote command has been disabled by the Host.
ExecutionerChangeRolesAfterTargetKilled: El <color=#c0c0c0>Verdugo</color> cambia de rol si su blanco muere
LawyerChangeRolesAfterTargetKilled: Cuando su cliente muere, el <color=#008080>Abogado</color> se convierte en
LaywerShouldChangeRoleAfterTargetKilled: Should Lawyer Change Role when Target Dies
LawyerTargetDeadInMeeting:
Tu cliente ha sido asesinado despiadadamente durante la reunión.
Tu rol cambiará dependiendo de las opciones.
FireworkerRadius: Radio de explosión de Fuegos Artificiales
SniperCanKill: El <color=#ff1919>Francotirador</color> puede matar con balas restantes
SniperAimAssistOneshot: Ayuda de disparo para el primer tiro sólamente
PyroBurnCooldown: Kill Cooldown after killing a doused player
NameDisplayAddons: Enseñar complementos al lado del nombre del rol

♥ - Used by Lovers or Romantic.
✚ - Used by Medic to mark their target.
⦿ - This player is in a duel with the Pirate.
!? - This player was marked by the Quizmaster and must answer the question correctly to survive.
☜ - Used by Schrödinger's cat to mark their teammate.
◈ - This player marked by the Shroud and will die if the Shroud is not killed or ejected by the end of the meeting.
⚠ - This player is a Snitch or Solsticer who has finished their tasks.
★ - Used by Super Star or Cyber or Marshall.
† - This player was spelled and will die if the Witch is not killed by the end of the Meeting.
∇ - Used by Kamikaze to mark their targets.
■ - Used by Lightning to mark their Quantum Ghosts.
⊠ - Used by Jailer to mark their prisoner.
● - Used by Baker to mark who has Bread.
♠ - Used by Soul Collector to mark who's death they're predicting.
⦿ - Used by Plaguebearer to mark who they have plagued.
♣ - Shown on the Coven member with the Necronomicon. This is only shown to Coven.
⌘ - This player is Jinxed. This is only shown to Coven.
ø - This player is Illusioned. This is only shown to Coven.
♻ - This player is Stoned. This is only shown to Coven.
✂ - This player is a Voodoo Doll. This is only shown to Coven.

Message.GhostRoleInfo: Información sobre Roles de Fantasma ¡Hola! Un poco sobre los roles de fantasma... Los roles de fantasma impactan drásticamente en el juego, por lo que no se recomiendan para lobbies pequeños, si no estás familiarizado. Aparición: Los roles de fantasma solo aparecen después de la muerte, las primeras x personas de (equipo) en morir los obtienen. PD: Si tu rol anterior no tenía tareas (por ejemplo, sheriff), tus tareas como rol de fantasma no son necesarias para ganar por tareas
Message.ApocalypseInfo:
Every role of the <#ff174f>Apocalypse</color> Team has their own objective to carry out in order to transform.
<#2B0804>Transformed</color> <#ff174f>Apocalypse</color> members have a drastic change on the game and are immortal (except for being voted), but everyone will be notified that they have transformed.

Roles: <#e5f6b4>Plaguebearer</color>, <#A675A1>Soul Collector</color>, <#bf9f7a>Baker</color>, <#cc0044>Berserker</color>
Transformed: <#343136>Pestilence</color>, <#644661>Death</color>, <#83461c>Famine</color>, <#2B0804>War</color>

Apocalypse members can see eachother's roles and ability icons.
Like Neutral Killers, Apocalypse members keep the game going as well, have fun!
Message.CovenInfo: The <#ac42f2>Coven is a faction of evildoers who specialize in Witchcraft. Their goal is to kill all who would oppose the <#ac42f2>Coven. They use the Necronomicon to enhance their powers, but only one member at a time can hold it. Most Coven roles can only kill if they hold the Necronomicon. A random Coven member will spawn with the Necronomicon, denoted by the <#ac42f2>♣ symbol next to their name. If the Necronomicon holder dies, the Necronomicon will be randomly given to another <#ac42f2>Coven member that is alive. During a meeting, Coven players can vote each other to determine who will gain the Necronomicon the following round. If the votes end in a tie or nobody votes, the Necronomicon holder will be the same. Votes will be returned and you will be allowed to vote normally.

QuizmasterInfoLong:
(Neutrals):
As the Quizmaster, you can mark a player using your Kill button. In the next meeting, the marked player will have "?!" next to their name. The player will die if they answer the question wrong or doesn't answer. The player will live if the Quizmaster is killed/ejected in the same meeting.
The Quizmaster cannot mark multiple people in the same round
